message: Given that my money loses value faster than yours (20% vs 10% per round), I suggest a 60-40 split in my favor to compensate for this disadvantage. This is fair and allows us both to maximize our gains by agreeing now.

Alice, I understand your concern about the different inflation rates. However, I believe a 55-45 split in my favor is more equitable, considering that the value of the money is decreasing for both of us. This offer balances the disadvantage you mentioned earlier.
